snippet: A new Lower East Side development will offer amenities including kosher and vegan food service and a pool with single-sex swimming hours.
abstract: Developer Michael Bolla hopes that condominium development opening in long-dormant Public School 12 on Manhattan's Lower East Side will spark a revival of the neighborhood's dwindling Jewish community; emphasizes that all buyers will be welcome, but expresses hope that building's location, within walking distance of historic synagogues, will be attractive to Jewish buyers.
lead_paragraph: A new Lower East Side development will offer amenities including kosher and vegan food service and a pool with single-sex swimming hours.

headline.print_headline: A Building As Catalyst For Culture A Building as Catalyst
headline.seo: Posting - Bringing Back Some Jewish Character on the Lower East Side
headline.main: A Building as a Catalyst for Jewish Culture
